content:
2 Easy Ways to Download Videos from YouTube Using Opera Mini Web Browser (Mobile) 
 Home Random Browse Articles Notifications Add to This Page Add Tip Easy Ways to Help Approve Questions Review Tech Feedback Fix Spelling More Things to Try...   
 Log in / Sign up   
 Desktop Site   
 Talk How to Download Videos from YouTube Using Opera Mini Web Browser (Mobile)   
 Opera Mini is a Web Browser which has gone too much popular these days. But while downloading videos from  YouTube  it shows can't download. Well let's see the trick to download the videos. 
 Steps Edit 
 Method One of Two: By Changing the URL Edit 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/4f\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-1.jpg\/v4-459px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/4f\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-1.jpg\/v4-759px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":387.95180722892,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":640.96385542169} 
 1 
 Go to the YouTube website.  Here is the  link .
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/b\/b8\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-2.jpg\/v4-459px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/b\/b8\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-2.jpg\/v4-759px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":387.95180722892,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":640.96385542169} 
 2 
 Locate the YouTube search bar and type the name of the video you want to download. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/e9\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-3.jpg\/v4-459px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-3.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/e9\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-3.jpg\/v4-759px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":387.95180722892,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":640.96385542169} 
 3 
 Select the desired video you want to download from the search result list.  Note that not to click on watch video.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/a\/ab\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-4.jpg\/v4-459px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-4.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/a\/ab\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-4.jpg\/v4-759px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-4.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":387.95180722892,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":640.96385542169} 
 4 
 Go to the address bar of the browser where you type the URL.  You will see the address bar starting with (m.)
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/3\/3c\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-5.jpg\/v4-459px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-5.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/3\/3c\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-5.jpg\/v4-759px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-5.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":387.95180722892,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":640.96385542169} 
 5 
 Remove the (m. ) and type (ss) (without dot).
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/4c\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-6.jpg\/v4-459px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-6.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/4c\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-6.jpg\/v4-759px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-6.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":387.95180722892,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":640.96385542169} 
 6 
 Click OK.  You will notice that a new page will open where you can download your video.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/e1\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-7.jpg\/v4-459px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-7.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/e1\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-7.jpg\/v4-759px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-7.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":387.95180722892,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":640.96385542169} 
 7 
 Select your desired format and then click on the download button. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/eb\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-8.jpg\/v4-459px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-8.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/eb\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-8.jpg\/v4-759px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-8.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":387.95180722892,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":640.96385542169} 
 8 
 Opera Mini will ask now for a path to download your file.  Select the download path and download the video!
 Method Two of Two: By Javascript Edit 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/e1\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-9.jpg\/v4-459px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-9.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/e1\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-9.jpg\/v4-759px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-9.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":387.95180722892,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":640.96385542169} 
 1 
 Open Opera Mini Browser. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/d\/db\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-10.jpg\/v4-459px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-10.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/d\/db\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-10.jpg\/v4-759px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-10.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":387.95180722892,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":640.96385542169} 
 2 Go to  YouTube 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/7\/7f\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-11.jpg\/v4-459px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-11.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/7\/7f\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-11.jpg\/v4-759px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-11.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":387.95180722892,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":640.96385542169} 
 3 
 Select bookmarks(#5) in your opera mini.  Note that #5 is a shortcut of opera mini 6 and higher versions.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/6\/6b\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-12.jpg\/v4-459px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-12.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/6\/6b\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-12.jpg\/v4-759px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-12.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":387.95180722892,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":640.96385542169} 
 4 
 Add bookmark to the site and name it  YouTube download . 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/f5\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-13.jpg\/v4-459px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-13.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/f5\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-13.jpg\/v4-759px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-13.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":387.95180722892,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":640.96385542169} 
 5 
 Replace the URL with a javascript.  You can find it on blogspot
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/6\/6c\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-14.jpg\/v4-459px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-14.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/6\/6c\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-14.jpg\/v4-759px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-14.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":387.95180722892,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":640.96385542169} 
 6 
 Save the bookmark of it. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/1\/1a\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-15.jpg\/v4-459px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-15.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/1\/1a\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-15.jpg\/v4-759px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-15.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":387.95180722892,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":640.96385542169} 
 7 
 Select the desired video on YouTube you were going to download. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/3\/3e\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-16.jpg\/v4-459px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-16.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/3\/3e\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-16.jpg\/v4-759px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-16.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":387.95180722892,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":640.96385542169} 
 8 
 Scroll down and select desktop view or classic view. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/6\/61\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-17.jpg\/v4-459px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-17.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/6\/61\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-17.jpg\/v4-759px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-17.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":387.95180722892,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":640.96385542169} 
 9 
 Go to your browser settings and look for  single column view .  Turn it on.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/6\/67\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-18.jpg\/v4-459px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-18.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/6\/67\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-18.jpg\/v4-759px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-18.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":387.95180722892,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":640.96385542169} 
 10 
 Reload the webpage. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/96\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-19.jpg\/v4-459px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-19.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/96\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-19.jpg\/v4-759px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-19.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":387.95180722892,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":640.96385542169} 
 11 
 Select the Saved Bookmark. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/5\/55\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-20.jpg\/v4-459px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-20.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/5\/55\/Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-20.jpg\/v4-759px-Download-Videos-from-YouTube-Using-Opera-Mini-Web-Browser-%28Mobile%29-Step-20.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":387.95180722892,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":640.96385542169} 
 12 
 You will find a download box appearing below.  Click on download button save your path and the file is downloaded!

 Add New Question 
 How can I download JavaScript? 
								Answered by  
								wikiHow Contributor							 
 You don't need to download anything.  JavaScript support is included with your browser.

 Tips Edit 
 You can follow the first method (by changing the URL directly) to download YouTube videos to the PC.
